title: ZkSolrResourceLoader doesn't support loading jars for a configuration from ZooKeeper
description: In the past I could put a jar file in /collection1/lib and have it autoloaded, but in the new ZK world I can't.  If we are going to have special rules on how cores work, maybe we should deprecate this autoloading of jars?   I did take a stab at trying to load a jar from ZK, but it was a total mess.  I am going to paste my diff though in case others want to offer up suggestions.

comments.author: Eric Pugh
comments.content: My work in adding a ZK aware jar file loading.
